description: This Java source file defines the class MockPowerConfigurationCluster, which extends MockCluster and implements capabilities related to power configuration, including battery status, voltage, and alarms. It includes attributes for battery metrics, methods to set and get power-related status, and handles alarms for power issues.

classes.name: MockPowerConfigurationCluster
classes.description: A mock implementation of a power configuration cluster for testing, handling battery status, voltage, alarms, and related attributes.

methods.name: MockPowerConfigurationCluster
methods.description: Constructor initializing power configuration attributes and capabilities, with options for custom configurations.

methods.name: setLowBattery
methods.description: Set the low battery status, optionally triggering an alarm event or report.

methods.name: isLowBattery
methods.description: Query whether the battery is considered low.

methods.name: isACPowerLost
methods.description: Check if AC power is lost.

methods.name: setACPowerLost
methods.description: Set whether AC power is lost, triggering corresponding alarm event.

methods.name: isBatteryBad
methods.description: Check if the battery is in a bad state.

methods.name: setBatteryBad
methods.description: Update battery bad status and trigger alarm.

methods.name: isBatteryMissing
methods.description: Check if the battery is missing.

methods.name: setBatteryMissing
methods.description: Update battery missing status and trigger alarm.

methods.name: isTemperatureHigh
methods.description: Check if battery temperature is high.

methods.name: setTemperatureHigh
methods.description: Set high temperature flag and trigger alarm.

methods.name: setBatteryPercentage
methods.description: Update battery remaining percentage and report.

methods.name: getBatteryVoltage
methods.description: Get the current battery voltage in decivolts.

methods.name: setBatteryVoltage
methods.description: Set a new battery voltage value and report.
